content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Copper Cable Factory Interface at Position(2.5, 17.5)
Consists of:
– Cable factory input chest at (2.5, 17.5)
– Dedicated factory burner inserter at (3.5, 17.5) whose neighbors include an assembling machine at (1.5, 19.5)

### Extraction System at Position(–3.5, 27.5)
Consists of:
– Extraction system burner inserter at (–3.5, 27.5) with drop position (–3.5, 28.5)

### Depot Belt Structure at Position(3.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
– Belt depot wooden chest placed at (3.5, 15.5)
– Dedicated transport belt segment at (4.5, 15.5) adjacent to the chest
– Depot burner inserter placed at (3.5, 14.5) adjacent to the chest

### Electricity Generator at Position(–0.5, 24.5)
Consists of:
– Steam engine (generator) at (–0.5, 24.5)
– Boiler at (–5.5, 24.0)
– Offshore pump at (–7.5, 25.5)

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Transport Belt Connection Error
 – When connecting a transport belt, do not use a steam engine as the target. Only connect to an inserter or another valid input entity that accepts items.

• Placement Distance Error
 – Ensure that the player moves close enough to a target position for placement; otherwise, distance limits may prevent placing the entity.

• Undefined Variable Error
 – Verify that all variables (for example, the intended target chest) are defined before use and that naming is consistent.

• Inventory Shortage Error
 – Check that the required items (such as a wooden chest) are present in the inventory prior to attempting placement.
